body.p: For a list of major relational databases and the drivers that are available for them, see .
In addition, the following is a list of other popular databases along with instructions for getting the drivers that are necessary to access the databases in :

ul.li: eXist database - Copy the jar files from the eXist database install directory to the install directory as described in the procedure for configuring an eXist data source.
MarkLogic database (Deprecated) - Download the MarkLogic driver from MarkLogic Community site.
Oracle 11g database (Deprecated) - Go to and download the Oracle 11g JDBC driver called ojdbc6.jar.
PostgreSQL database (Deprecated) - Go to and download the PostgreSQL JDBC driver specific for your server version.
Microsoft SQL Server 2019 database (Deprecated) - Download the appropriate MS SQL JDBC driver from the Microsoft website.
